input.sentences: the hipsters got together to have a dinner together .
they took pictures of all the different artwork .
they had a few laughs and a good time .
after that they sat down for a few beers .
output.sentences: These three hipsters met for dinner.
There were various pictures and artwork at the restaurant.
The artists shared their stories with the hipsters.
They had a great time and lots of laughs that evening.
At the restaurant they sat and enjoyed their beers.
